resources.string: At Unwind, we get it. Sometimes life gets too much. More and more of us are busy, stressed and anxious. It is important to unwind - hence our name.

Unwind is here to help you take five during your busy day, and you can make of it what you want. It can be a daily journal of what is troubling you, and offer you guidance on what to do about it. That might be a meditation exercise, or just helping you plan your week. Or you can ask us questions about where to find help locally.
